samples.subject: [SR #:3-75991954557] ADP Notification of Service Request Resolution - [SR #: 3-75991954557]

ai_user_payload_preview.HTML:
Hi Tiejing, 

Your Service Request (3-75991954557) has been completed.

The final payroll of 2024 processed December 2 with total Federal Tax of 2351.16.

We appreciate your continued partnership and look forward to supporting your business needs.

Thank you,

Heather
ADP Canada

samples.subject: REMINDER: Banking Holiday Closure on Monday, September 1, 2025 | RAPPEL : Fermeture le lundi 1er septembre 2025 en raison d’un jour férié

ai_user_payload_preview.HTML:
EN  |  FR

 

 

Please Review Your Payroll Schedule

There is a Banking Holiday on Monday, September 1, 2025, to observe Labour Day.

 

Your regular payroll schedule may be impacted by the Banking holiday on Monday, September 1, 2025. All bank production centres and branches across Canada, as well as ADP offices, will be closed on this date. As a result, September 1 cannot be used as an input date or pay date and cannot be included as a business day for funding payroll.

What should you do? 

 

REVIEW YOUR TRANSMISSION AND PAY DATES

We encourage you to review your payroll schedule as your pay date may be impacted. If Monday, September 1 falls on or between your regular input and pay date, you may need to change your input date and/or pay date and submit your payroll early to ensure your employees are paid on time.

Please use the chart on The Bridge to help you determine when you must input and run your payroll based on your desired pay date to meet your funding terms with ADP. If you do not meet your funding terms with ADP, a late funding charge may apply.

 

DO YOU HAVE A TIME PRODUCT WITH ADP?                  

Make sure you update your Holiday Programs. Click here for resources: 

  • ADP Workforce Now 3 Character Company Code Holiday Program Maintenance. 
  • ADP Workforce Now 4 Character Company Code Holiday Program Maintenance. 
  • TeamPay by ADP® EZLaborManager. 

 

IMPACTS TO DELIVERY IF YOU HAVE PRINTDIRECT SERVICES

Our delivery partners: Loomis, FedEx, Purolator, UPS, Canada Post, and local couriers will not operate on Monday, September 1, 2025.

 

If I transmit my file on…

Printed payroll will be out for delivery on…

Friday, August 29, 2025
ai_user_payload_preview.TEXT:
EN  |  FR

[A person in a blue shirt  AI-generated content may be incorrect.]

Please Review Your Payroll Schedule
There is a Banking Holiday on Monday, September 1, 2025, to observe Labour Day.

Your regular payroll schedule may be impacted by the Banking holiday on Monday, September 1, 2025. All bank production centres and branches across Canada, as well as ADP offices, will be closed on this date. As a result, September 1 cannot be used as an input date or pay date and cannot be included as a business day for funding payroll.
What should you do?

REVIEW YOUR TRANSMISSION AND PAY DATES
We encourage you to review your payroll schedule as your pay date may be impacted. If Monday, September 1 falls on or between your regular input and pay date, you may need to change your input date and/or pay date and submit your payroll early to ensure your employees are paid on time.
Please use the chart on The Bridge<https://thebridge.adp.ca/legislation/w/legislative-updates/6932/september-1-2025-labour-day> to help you determine when you must input and run your payroll based on your desired pay date to meet your funding terms with ADP. If you do not meet your funding terms with ADP, a late funding charge may apply.

DO YOU HAVE A TIME PRODUCT WITH ADP?                 
Make sure you update your Holiday Programs. Click here for resources:

  *   ADP Workforce Now 3 Character Company Code Holiday Program Maintenance<https://thebridge.adp.ca/en/wfn-products-page/workforce-now-3cc/w/wiki/3744/holiday-program-maintenance>.
  *   ADP Workforce Now 4 Character Company Code Holiday Program Maintenance<https://thebridge.adp.ca/en/wfn-products-page/workforce-now-4cc/w/wiki/4398/holiday-program-maintenance>.
  *   TeamPay by ADP® EZLaborManager<https://thebridge.adp.ca/en/teampay/w/wiki/4517/holiday-program-maintenance>.

IMPACTS TO DELIVERY IF YOU HAVE PRINTDIRECT SERVICES
Our delivery partners: Loomis, FedEx, Purolator, UPS, Canada Post, and local couriers will not operate on Monday, September 1, 2025.

If I transmit my file on…
Printed payroll will be out for delivery on…
Friday, August 29, 2025
Tuesday, September 2, 2025

Please contact Canada Delivery Service if you require additional information at 1-866-370-4382.

Thank you for entrusting us with your business. We appreciate your continued commitment and the partnership we have with you.

ADP Canada


EN  |  FR

Veuillez vérifier votre calendrier de paie
Le lundi 1er septembre 2025 est un jour férié (fête du travail).

Le jour férié du lundi 1er septembre 2025 pourrait avoir une incidence sur votre calendrier de paie normal. Les bureaux d’ADP et l’ensemble des centres de production et des succursales bancaires à l’échelle du Canada seront fermés. En conséquence, le 1er septembre ne peut pas être utilisé comme date de saisie ou de paie et ne peut pas être considéré comme un jour ouvrable aux fins du financement de la paie.
Que devriez-vous faire?

VÉRIFIEZ VOS DATES DE TRANSMISSION ET DE PAIE
Nous vous encourageons à vérifier votre calendrier de paie, car votre date de paie pourrait être touchée. Si le lundi 1er septembre correspond à votre date de saisie ou votre date de paie normale ou se situe entre ces deux dates, vous devrez peut-être modifier votre date de saisie ou de paie et régler votre paie à l’avance pour veiller à ce que vos employé(e)s reçoivent leur paie à temps.

Veuillez consulter le tableau sur The Bridge<https://thebridge.adp.ca/legislation/w/mises-a-jour-legislatives/6933/lundi-1-septembre-2025-fete-du-travail> pour vous aider à déterminer à quel moment vous devez entrer les données et traiter votre paie en fonction de la date de paie voulue, afin de vous assurer de respecter vos modalités de provisionnement avec ADP. Si vous ne respectez pas vos modalités de provisionnement avec ADP, des frais de provisionnement tardif pourraient s’appliquer.

UTILISEZ-VOUS UN PRODUIT DE GESTION DU TEMPS D’ADP?
Assurez-vous de mettre à jour vos programmes de jours fériés. Cliquez ici pour accéder à des ressources :

  *   Gestion du programme de jours fériés − ADP Workforce Now (code d’entreprise à 3 caractères)<https://thebridge.adp.ca/workforce-now-3cc/w/centre-de-connaissances/3768/gestion-du-programme-de-jours-feries>
  *   Gestion du programme de jours fériés − ADP Workforce Now (code d’entreprise à 4 caractères)<https://thebridge.adp.ca/workforce-now-4cc/w/centre-de-connaissances/4487/gestion-du-programme-de-jours-feries>
  *   ÉquipePaie par ADPᴹᴰ – ezLaborManager<https://thebridge.adp.ca/teampay/w/connaissances/4521/solutions-heures-et-presences>

INCIDENCES SUR LA LIVRAISON SI VOUS ÊTES CLIENT DES SERVICES PRINTDIRECT
Nos partenaires de livraison : Loomis, FedEx, Purolator, UPS, Postes Canada et les services de messagerie locaux seront fermés le lundi 1er septembre 2025.

Si je transmets mon fichier le…
Les bordereaux de paie imprimés seront expédiés le…
Vendredi 29 août 2025
Mardi 2 septembre 2025

Veuillez communiquer avec ADP au numéro sans frais 1 866 346-1882 et sélectionner l’option 2 pour Services PrintDirect, puis l’option 2 pour la livraison si vous avez besoin de renseignements supplémentaires.

Nous vous remercions de nous confier vos affaires. Nous sommes heureux de votre engagement et de votre partenariat continus.

ADP Canada

The information contained in this document is summary in nature and is intended to provide general guidance only. It should not be viewed as a replacement for legal or professional advice.
